titles.title: Relating to the disposition of Senate amendments to the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 84) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 1998 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 1999, 2000, 2001, and 2002.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 5/22/1997--Introduced. Provides for the House to concur in the Senate amendment to H. Con. Res. 84 (congressional budget) with or without amendment, whichever is necessary to achieve the end that the text of such resolution thereby is finally adopted, or the text thereby proposed by the House amendment to the Senate amendment is the text of H. Con. Res. 86 (congressional budget).
